comments.author: Sue
comments.content: I add onions, chopped, about 3/4 cups, finely chopped, and add it, after step 4, then add 1/2 tsp ground ginger or 1tsp ginger- garlic paste, and a pod of red chilli,broken into bits. I don't like the sweet flavor, so no brown sugar. 1 tsp of lime juice at the very end, adds flavor

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content:
Yes, very good point about adding lime (or lemon) juice at the end! I did that too but forgot to put it in the recipe, and it makes a big difference. I'll go back and edit for future readers.

Thanks,
Michael
